CHAT.comment: Time is 14:10. Video tape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio tape

MOT and Chi play together with the magnets in a cooperative manner , and the activities are largely suggested and directed by the Chi. Most of the time is spent building things on the black base. The silver men are used most often and are made to represent olympic athletes or wrestlers. There is some magnet talk , and the Mot does attempt to engage the Chi in play that focuses on magnetic forces.

u.a: Keno is a game

gets up from chair and walks out of room
briefly talks about arrangement of tape recorder on table

person who asked the question
placing silver men in standing positon on black base magnet
picks up blue/white checkered square and moves it towards black base
<$=2> Chi is attempting to balance men on top of one another on black platform
whispered

indicating area behind silver men on the platform
holds blue/white checked square up behind the men on the platform

puts washer on the hand of a man at the bottom of the pyramid

puts ball back on the hand of a man who is holding a silver stick
silver man with objects in both hands falls over
stands man back up and removes the silver stick , a .k .a . javelin , from his hand
puts silver stick on one of the men

the red side of the horseshoe

uses hands to demonstrate
pushes hands towards one another , and when they get close to touching , pulls them apart
picks up yellow wand and moves it towards black base , knocking over some of the silver men

moves wand over the change on the table , pauses over the dime

successfully balances the silver stick to the man on the left side and the one that had been stuck to the man on the right side of the black base falls .
